parametric design(grasshopper 3d), simulation of various processes that mimic the structure of a plant leaf

node.description: My name is Kristine Egiazarian, I'm a creator and digital nomad. I would love to join your community. I've created 3 clothing items that are made of liquid glass, it seemed important to me to create a collection dedicated to nomads. Nowadays creators/artists are scattered all over the world looking for their place or awareness of their diversity of being in this world. A place does not identify you as a person. It was important to me to display the flexibility/transparency through and softness of a new generation of digital nomads who want to build a new peaceful world that is transparent yet robust.

node.description: My brand Porka_X reflects my vision of future clothes. Creating virtual clothes - I create more than clothing, I create a character. I see it as a canvas, where I'm trying to find the best shape and then apply prints on it. Print - is my self-expression. My prints reflect my passion, what is in my mind. The first impression people usually get from clothes, gestures, moves. Working in CLO3D I have an opportunity to create my own installations. Characters, that will present clothes how I see them. When I work with virtual clothes I feel freedom and pass this feeling to others. Virtual life, like virtual clothes, help us to get rid of prejudice

"Somewhere, in a sparsely populated galaxy, there is a planet like any other. The creatures of this world have four limbs. The two lower limbs enable them to move forward and backward, and the two upper limbs enable them to kill"
This quote is from experimental sci-fi animation masterpiece called ‘Fantastic Planet’ directed by Rène Laloux and based on Stefan's Wul novel. It isn't hard to guess whom this quote is referring to as 'the creatures' with four 'limbs'. It's also easy to understand that Syro 'Drague' Knit is a loving tribute to this very movie. This magnificent blue garment has a loose cropped fit and it is topped with a 3D visualization of the main character inhabiting "Fantastic Planet", called "Drague" as the sweater does.
The meaning of the 'Drague' Knit is based on film's narrative allegory about animal rights and human rights, as well as racism — problems that remain extremely relevant to this day.
I was inspired by global crisis. I dipped my ('asil) dress in oil to show that the reason for all wars on Earth is the struggle for resources.
When work follows you everywhere

node.description: This is blazer inspired by genius artist Mikhail Vrubel . i use part of his paint

Darkness 2.0 is a sleeveless halterneck jumpsuit. Taking the classic men's shirt and suit as the prototype, through 3D three-dimensional tailoring, the original structure was dismantled and rebuilt into Darkness 2.0. The shirt is disassembled into two symmetrical parts, which are added to the sides of the jumpsuit as the outer skirt. The front waist has an outer apron with a classic suit hem structure, and a fishtail-shaped hem design.

I've noticed a capybara hype emerging among the people around me. Their laid-back attitude combined with a cute figure is said to be brilliant for a mood boost. So I wanted to make that part of my design and AR is perfect for something a bit unrealistic. I went with a huge stuffed capybara paired with an overall which is also chill, with a loose fit and genderless .

node.description: The design of garments was built on the idea of healing sounds. The Chladni plates (the visualization of sound vibrations) provide a therapeutic effect on the human body. The prints for the collection refer to images of the plate's surface and motion between various frequency values. Sooner or later, fashion tech specialists will create "healing garments" for daily use to make people calm down during anxiety, but now it's just a fantasy of the future of techwear.

node.description:
The biggest non nuclear explosion shattered half of Beirut almost 3years ago . The port silos filled with grains from Ukraine, split in two, miraculously defied gravity, standing tall and high , protecting half of the city!! An angel must have been there! For few days all you could hear was the sound of broken glass beeing swept away. So i created this glass dress for that angel to commemorate the 3rd anniversary of Beirut port explosion. All proceeds will be split in half between Lebanese and Ukrainian displaced families.
NB the model doesn't require any texture I just added a photo in the texture tab bec I couln't send the application without one. I hope u can compress the H265 down to 3MB , I also attached an H264 3MB just in case .

node.description: The dress is inspired by the shining stars of the night sky In the center of the composition, a bright star, from it softly fa down the drapery and closes behind a smaller star. The accent of the dress is a translucent hem strewn with star pollen. Wave-like shiny threads of the pattern convey the movements of the clouds. In this way, this composition looks vicious from all sides.
Futuristic contemporary Block Chain dress reflects a connection between physical and digital worlds. Block Chain dress consists of the mirror mini dress and removable chain skirt.

All products were created with the support of the new digital atelier A.D.A. (Alkali Digital Atelier) Costume (Big pants and Wings sweatshirt), combines technology and nature. The glass effect of sweatshirt has a print inspired by insect, mainly wings. All sets are created for any gender and can be worn separately.

Extraordinary fabric and skull detailed design bring us to metaverse. You can see the Magnezyum aesthetic in this long dress. Having a transparent and furry texture, it fits your body like a second skin.

node.description:
This work was inspired by the series "Severance".
It is dedicated to all people who feel out of place
From A.D.A. (digital atelier)

Meta Sweatshirt is a look at digital clothing through the internet and self-expression. The sweatshirt touches on the topic of Internet slander. It shows a subway map that doesn't exist. Although there is an official website of this metro in the city of Barnaul, which tourists and even the townspeople of the city of Barnaul believe in. It really looks very realistic and may well compete with the website of the existing metro. Such the website is far from the only fake subway website on the Internet. Fake information on the Internet is a huge problem of the 21st century that needs to be addressed. This Meta Sweatshirt reminds us that you don't always have to believe what is written on the Internet

These bold pants are part of a collection paying homage to the queen of all colors: black. Achieving variation through different materials, surface characteristics and silhouettes is a significant part of the design process. Made out of soft leather, these pants come with a voluminous cut and pleated detailing.

This piece is inspired the idea of wearing who you are like an armour in one of the outfit that most people are feeling insecure in with , regardless their body size and shape. For me, the experience of being able to adjust no matter where i am has come from my root from growing up with the 2 cultures of indonesian and indian. Today i'm wearing the mix like an armor even in the most uncomfortable situation.

node.description: "Darkness 1.0" is a tube top dress, which is based on two classic men's trousers. Through 3D draping, the trousers are dissected and assembled into a tube top dress. The upper body of the dress is a tube top with a suit pants double-waisted structure, and the lower body is an A-line skirt with ruffles on both sides of the skirt and a pleated design on the back.

This piece is inspired by the dressing of the Isekiri people of Nigeria, Traditionally, Itsekiri men wear a long-sleeved shirt called a Kemeje. The Itsekiris are a complex mixture of the many different ethnicities and races that have settled in one area since the piece is inspired by their dressing. The piece is name Oneness according to their way of life.

node.description: Love hurts and that's a fact. So why not wearing out your heart in your sleeve (well, more like on your whole outfit) and express your true emotions? Through matching cuts and folds in the pattern this jumpsuit simulate an heart shape not forgetting the cavity and the (hearts)strings and anything mixed feelings related (the graphics applied). Is this an armor to protect you from more heartbreaks or is it a pride symbol of love? That’s up to you.

The dress was inspired by the sushi scene in the Sex and the City movie. Green buttons represent Wasabi, and the pink buttons represent Gari. Sushi on the skirt are supposed to bounce with movement. The dress could either be worn over the naked body or clothes.

All products were created with the support of the new digital atelier A.D.A. (Alkali Digital Atelier) Costume (Big pants and Wings sweatshirt), combines technology and nature. The glass effect of sweatshirt has a print inspired by insect, mainly wings. All sets are created for any gender and can be worn separately.
Two hearts in one dress is Love. The abbreviation of LUV means Listen, Understand, and Validate.
It's no secret that since the days of dress combinations, people have started wearing underwear and home clothes when going out I bring to your attention wild pajamas: shorts and a top

The design of garments was built on the idea of healing sounds. The Chladni plates (the visualization of sound vibrations) provide a therapeutic effect on the human body. The prints for the collection refer to images of the plate's surface and motion between various frequency values. Sooner or later, fashion tech specialists will create "healing garments" for daily use to make people calm down during anxiety, but now it's just a fantasy of the future of techwear.

Notturno is an Italian word that indicates something that inhabits the night. In music it also means an instrumental composition, originally intended for outdoor and night performance. Notturno dress is designed looking at the world of medieval influenced fairy tales, taking it as inspiration from the vision of a dragon in the night. Notturno dress is opalescent and deep like the darkness of the night.

Featuring a leather belt and platinum buttons, this lavender jumpsuit is designed for fun, self-expression and self-confidence. This outfit can exist not only in the virtual world, but also in your wardrobe. Just look, friends, at these cute hearts on the chest! Just wonderful!

node.description: Wonderful, gentle, evening, fashionable one-shoulder dress for a modern lady. size s. I am a designer and tailor, and I can make patterns for my dresses. I like to make women tender, fashionable and beautiful. Made in clo 3d.
node.designteamcomment: Please change the background color to black (360 file)

node.description: The dress is inspired by the shining stars of the night sky In the center of the composition, a bright star, from it softly fall down the drapery and closes behind a smaller star. The accent of the dress is a translucent hem strewn with star pollen. Wave-like shiny threads of the pattern convey the movements of the clouds. In this way, this composition looks fascinating from all sides.
node.designteamcomment: 1) Record the rotation of the item by 360 degrees with the following settings: - 150 frames - Duration of the animation: 5 seconds - 30 FPS 2) Please change the background color to black (360 file)

node.description:
“Burning For You” Dress envisions a future where fashion transcends the physical body or an event in the real world where our digital identities permeate individual lifestyles to become the new reality.
“Burning For You” dives down into the terrorism and genocide that is taking place nowadays in Ukraine. The aggressive war Russia is doing toward the independent sovereign state is a crime to talk about. The future of this communication is here, in this dress to try on.
node.designteamcomment: 1) Please change the background color to black (360 file) 2) If your item has two states and transformation effects: please record the rotation of the item by 720 degrees (two circles 360 + 360) with following settings: - 300 frames 0–100 frame: first state of the item 100–150 frame: transition effect 1 > 2 150–250 frame: second state of the item 250–299 frame: transition effect 2 > 1 - Duration of the animation: 10 seconds - 30 FPS To demonstrate both states and the transition effect between the two, use a mask from the files below: **[TOPS](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mZFgScZzZD7qAN04Kmpm6gF9SiCQy1ja/view)**

node.description: This outer was inspired by harpies from Greek mythologies. The design element used are feather and storm pattern which is the core element of bird. Referred to “Aello” (Storm Swift), which is one of three harpy sisters, according to Hesiod, an ancient Greek poet.

Wide trousers are a cool classic, creating their dynamic curves, I was inspired by the snake game on an old Nokia.The top of the look is a turtleneck, the jersey inserts on it remind me of a painted seagull in the form of a tick in any picture with the sea. I created such an everyday, but unusual look. This is not only in 3D, and there are exact copies of these products actually sewn. I wear them every day and I suggest you try it!
Windbreaker - down jacket for any weather. Summer in the morning and winter in the evening. You never know what will happen in your life during the day.
The last stage of the crysalid where the wings are almost fully developed
Like a lively, bubbly, and mysterious aquatic creature roaming in the deep ocean, the indigo glow is flowing all over the veins with the breath.

node.description: My dream puffer jacket.
The costume is inspired by Gilese 581. It is one of the 100 closest stars to the solar system, this star is called red dwarf and is located 20.5 light years from planet Earth.

node.description: This set of sportswear is a cropped top with a very youthful look, and the irregular graphics are fluorescent fabrics, showing the beauty of asymmetrical. This set is both sporty and casual.
Dress with a padded hem that maintains a comfortable temperature

node.description:
Second skin long sleeve top with 3D printed patches
This top represents the larvae status.

Low-rise digital cargo pants in y2k style as a symbol of the need to belong to a group with a similar views and the desire to stand out, to demonstrate one's own individuality. Trousers are complemented by infantile metal details which are the key characters in looks of this style. Let's play y2k aesthetics!
node.designteamcomment: Please change the static preview background to the transparent

node.description: The dress speaks of the dual nature and about the contradictions inside of each of us. It is built on contrasts and contradictions, rough metal armor on one side and the feminine silhouette of an evening dress on the other. The hypertrophied bottom of the dress is combined with delicate play of textures.

DIGITAL FASHION PIECE: ´VÓLCAN PUFF JACKET in 2 states: from puff to lava.
The red and black and turbulent volumetric shape on the arms references lava from an erupting volcano.
i am obsessed with byredo gypsy water and i think if it was a dress it would definitely look like this

Meta Sweatshirt is a look at digital clothing through the internet and self-expression. The sweatshirt touches on the topic of Internet slander. It shows a subway map that doesn't exist. Although there is an official website of this metro in the city of Barnaul, which tourists and even the townspeople of the city of Barnaul believe in. It really looks very realistic and may well compete with the website of the existing metro. Such the website is far from the only fake subway website on the Internet. Fake information on the Internet is a huge problem of the 21st century that needs to be addressed. This Meta Sweatshirt reminds us that you don't always have to believe what is written on the Internet

Five-Layer dress in a gradient fabric that goes between orange and purple like the sunrise sky, the layers are pleated but flare out at the end, reaching this gold line, I like adding gold details to my designs to make them fancier in a simple way. The top has boning to keep its structure. This dress is a sunrise-flavored popsicle.

node.description: wide-legged Trousers made out of interlock fabric, with elastic waistband and 3D side bodies made of sheer fabric and 3d printed fabric and frontal slits.

Baggy Streetwear Windbreaker trousers with two box pockets on each side. This design combined with the Windbreaker jacket to complete an entire windbreaker set. the inspiration behind this garment is from the freedom of movement with parkour and freerunning.
Inspired by japanese samuraï war clothes, my take on the garment was to renew actual history to build a new one for our time by switching it's original uses, materials and technique.
The outfit for a superwoman in the metaverse
